sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.css'], }) export class ContentComponent { @Input() title: string; constructor() { this.title = ''; } isPopupOpen = false; event = { title: '', description: '', date: '', time: '', location: '', category: '' }; openPopup() { this.isPopupOpen = true; } closePopup() { this.isPopupOpen = false; } onSubmit() { // Aquí puedes manejar la lógica para enviar el formulario console.log('Evento creado:', this.event); this.closePopup(); } }
